I was referring to the movies "2001: A Space Odyssey" and "2010: The year we make contact".

AND True, I am registered here.

Nope, but want to. Too bad I'm poor

The user below me uses Raptr

Nope. What is Raptr?

The user below me prefers notpad to Microsoft word.

Depends. I prefer Notepad to edit save files and stuff, but I prefer Word for actually writing.

The user below me has been to the Czech Republic.

HELL NO.

The user below me farted during their lifetime.

This is correct! wow you're good...

The user below me is not wearing a hat, a raincoat and sunglasses while commenting to this.

Wrong, im naked... *creepy face*

The user below me has already killed The Great 3 (Bill, Bob, jeb) atleast twice

Nope. What is Raptr?

Raptr is a stat tracker that gives you real-life rewards, in exchange of points that you earn playing and getting achivements

True. I've been playing since before we had quicksave and revert, the Original Three have died many times on my watch.

False. Well, that backfired, didn't it?

I guess... Yeah?

True as hell.
